entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView visual state not updating selected [Windows] #10595
  • VisualTreeElementExtensions.GetVisualTreeElements does not take into account device orientation #10593
  • [iOS] Shell TabBar overlaps ContentPage when calling Shell.SetTabBarIsVisible(this, true) #10591
  • Shell Title View Set at Shell.Xaml.cs is visible in alternative flyout items #10587
    Backlog
  • Xaml Compiler NullRef with Grid.Resources #10583
    Backlog
  • ListView duplicate first item #10582
  • Missing control equivalent to RichTextBox from WPF #10581
    Backlog

Closed

  • .Net Maui can't retrieve embedded resource from assembly with ImageSource.FromResource. (IOS) #10416
  • [BUG] Newly created view has IsVisible=ture #10584
  • RadioButton's FontIcon #10454
  • 'dotnet cake --target=VS' for the MAUI repo hangs on Windows #10450
  • Android skia canvas.DrawImage has no effect with SkiaBitmapExportContext #10575
  • Cannot run windows project after update #10571
  • Filepicker crashes with error "Value does not fall within the expected range" on Windows (10) when the app is distributed as exe #10577
  • Radius feature on Shadow not working #10586
  • VS 17.3.4 Breaks Maui iOS build. #10270
    7.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22451.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22504.1 #10599
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Fix crash disposing TabbedPage #10594
  • [Windows] Changes disposing items in CollectionView #10590
    t/bug, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃

Merged

  • Revert "Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.2.0 to 4.3.1 (#10541)" #10597
  • Fix essentials samples XAML #10538
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, 7.0
  • Update ContextFlyout sample to show more scenarios #10563
    area/desktop 🖥️, control-contextmenu
  • Bump Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Maps from 118.0.2.2 to 118.1.0 #10540
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.2.0 to 4.3.1 #10541
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10532
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Android] Improve CollectionView scrolling #10523
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • Generate a more complete splash screen drawable set for Android #10516
    area/single project ☝️, 7.0
  • iOS15 WindowStateManager Window Support #10550
    community ✨
  • Don't fire appearing/disappearing with window #10530
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • [iOS] Fix crash disposing TabbedPage #10366
    t/bug, area/TabbedPage
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Make Grid of spacing consistent when rows/columns are collapsed #10556
    area/layout 🔲
  • Bump Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D from 1.0.3.1 to 1.0.4 #10502
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
